member.name: M:OSharp.Storyboard.Element.StartTrigger(System.Int32,System.Int32,OSharp.Storyboard.Events.Containers.TriggerType,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.UInt32})
member.summary: Start a trigger group. For more information, see: https://osu.ppy.sh/help/wiki/Storyboard_Scripting/Compound_Commands
member.param: Trigger type. It can be specified in a flag form like TriggerType.HitSoundWhistle | TriggerType.HitSoundSoft.
If use the listenSample, the trigger will listen to all hitsound in a track like HitsoundAllNormal.
Listen to a specific track. 0 represents default track.
